title: Animal Keeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give someone an animal each night based on their alignment. (see 1950)
- Give someone any animal at night. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Animals are items that give their holders one use of the listed abilities in https://docs.google.com/document/d/1h1jXDbKREe9AvsIFLASxvW1yPMq37nY4S0KuwlTivt8/edit?usp=sharing.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause at least three deaths through your animals.

desc:
Post 2107
*What's your favourite animal? I will use this information to cause mass destruction.*
